title: Launcher won't update after multiple tries on both clients
body: I've tried on both the new client and Legacy client, but the update will load all the way, then I'll get an error message? What should I do to fix this? The popup reads: "Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again." Then, when I click the "OKAY" button, it reads "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again once you restart the patcher." It says that the Live Incidents that may have caused this are the Account transfers and Matchmaking Issues in Ranked. Any help on this would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
It certainly sounds like your connection to the patching servers is pretty unstable, which could cause this type of issue. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused by a local network misconfiguration.

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable change.
After trying multiple different tactics, I just uninstalled and reinstalled the game, and it works fine now. Thanks though!
